title: Fury Road Diana
body:
We have Road Warrior :c who doesnt want a Furiosa-eske skin for diana 

[img]http://i.imgur.com/YRmhMVo.jpg[/img]

Sorry for the scribbe I did this on my phone after watching Mad Max....great movie

replies.body: Are we just gonna not mention the HOLY CRAP HE DID THAT ON A PHONE part of this topic? cuz thats amazing in my opinion
It'd probably be called Vandal Diana. You know. To fit that line of skins that already exists with a road warrior/apocalyptic theme. Look nice though.

I love the idea of wastelands type skins. Vi would be a natural fit as well!
WITNESS ME
Also this could actually work as they could rename it to Road Warrior Diana to avoid copy right infringe lol (if any would apply but still!)
I guess her W orbs could be tires? Her Q could have like dust particles. Dunno about her E and R

Jinx would fit this type of skin so much and so would vi becuase you could model them after **tank girl** and that's who i thought of when i saw Jinx and Vi(mainly vi but Jinx shares a similar style and personality as well)

Im not sure why Road Warrior Miss Fortune was retired to the skin vault, but the theme already exists, so I could see Riot adding more to the line, like what they did with the card skins recently. Anything for a new Diana skin though.
Pretty nice for a scribble. Love the concept, though. :)
...I absolutely want this as a skin. But I also want it as a background. Do you mind?

Maybe {{champion:131}} an E of mine in this concept would be in some connection to the first movie, since I have not seen the movie referenced for this concept, but the weaponry would maybe speak for all of the movies. Thinking maybe similar to the current E, with the lines then being shared of stars or shards of the Moon raining down onto the enemies as selected enhancing armor penetration with or with no concern for Magic {as referencing the movie, as if each child could take a strike with a knife onto the enemy: Moon Shards Rain.} Will think about R.  I like this concept. From: FuryofThornsRedo

Edit: Shards of Stars or Shards of Moon/ (Shared)

Maybe with {{champion:131}} my R For your Fury Road Diana, there would be the Rush concept, but maybe in the desert as being a Cosmic Whirlwind of comets, or stars whizzing by her fast as she moves in a (c) Charlie Brown (c) Pig Pen mannerism sort of way with my {{champion:131}} R. Cosmic Rush, and maybe the time of fast is fractions of time faster {{champion:98}}  than him? Only Riot League of Legends might know which Champion is the fastest with Rush abilities. Beyond my time or focus time, considering most of my time is in the appreciation of art.

Again, there is above a beautiful scribble. From: FuryofThornsRedo

Maybe {{champion:131}} my Q is a reverse curve to through off the enemies. Yes, all of them! {{champion:131}}  my W with Tires? Really, those would be difficult to carry along in battle. (Joke, since the enemies are all rock heads, maybe the orbs could be the heads of the enemy {{champion:131}} I am up against?) W, hmmm... {{champion:131}} I LOVE the MOON too much, please leave the W alone. From: FuryofThornsRedo
Very yes. I don't play Diana but Furiosa was soooo hot.
